mapper.sql: B.LEVEL_CODE AS 一级分类, B.LEVEL_NAME AS 一级分类, A.LEVEL_CODE AS 二级分类, A.LEVEL_NAME AS machiningName, C.LEVEL_CODE AS 品种分类, C.LEVEL_NAME AS breedName, A1.SALES_NAME AS 销售名, A1.SCIENTIFIC_NAME AS scientificName, A1.LOCAL_NAME AS localName, D.LEVEL_CODE AS 产品特征, D.LEVEL_NAME AS featureName, 'A2' AS gradeName, CONCAT(D.CLASSESTREE_CODE, 2) AS attributeCode, E.LEVEL_CODE AS 单箱净重, E.LEVEL_NAME AS weightName, F.LEVEL_CODE AS 包装规格, F.LEVEL_NAME AS normsOut, E.CLASSESTREE_CODE, PD.SL_PD_ID AS 产品id, PKG.SL_PD_PKG_ID AS 包装id, LOT.LOT_ID AS 批次id, (CASE SL.SL_MAIN_CLASS WHEN 0 THEN '生产型' WHEN 1 THEN '自产型' WHEN 2 THEN '代理型' WHEN 3 THEN 'OEM型' ELSE '' END)AS slMainClassName, IFNULL(SL.SL_MAIN_CLASS,'')AS slMainClass, IFNULL(ET.LIC_ADDR,'') AS slLicAddr, IFNULL(ET.EP_NAME,'') AS slName, IFNULL(ET2.LIC_ADDR,'') AS sllfAddr, IFNULL(ET2.EP_NAME,'') AS sllfName, (CASE BD.BRAND_CLASS WHEN 0 THEN '卖家独立品牌' WHEN 1 THEN '神农先生联合品牌' WHEN 2 THEN '神农客联合品牌' WHEN 3 THEN '神农人家联合品牌' ELSE '' END)AS brandClassName, IFNULL(BD.BRAND_CLASS,'')AS brandClass, IFNULL(BD.BRAND_NAME,'') AS brandName, IFNULL(BD.BRAND_ID,'') AS brandId, IFNULL(SUBSTRING(LOT.DATE_CODE,1,2),'') AS lotYear, IFNULL(SUBSTRING(LOT.DATE_CODE,3,2),'') AS lotMonth, IFNULL(SUBSTRING(LOT.DATE_CODE,5),'') AS lotDate, IFNULL(SL.SL_CODE_DIS,'')AS slCodeDis, IFNULL(LOT.DATE_CODE,'') AS lotCode, IFNULL(E.LEVEL_CODE,'')AS weightCode, IFNULL(F.LEVEL_CODE,'')AS normsCode, IFNULL(SL1.SL_CODE_MANUFACTURE,'')AS slCodeManufacture -- IFNULL(CONCAT(CONCAT(D.CLASSESTREE_CODE, 2),E.LEVEL_CODE,F.LEVEL_CODE,LEFT(SL.SL_CODE_DIS,1),BD.BRAND_CLASS,RIGHT(SL.SL_CODE_DIS,6),RIGHT(SL.SL_CODE_DIS,6),BD.BRAND_ID,LOT.DATE_CODE),'') AS lotCode

FROM pd_classestree AS A INNER JOIN ( SELECT CLASSESTREE_CODE, PARENT_CODE, LEVEL_NAME, LEVEL_CODE FROM PD_CLASSESTREE WHERE CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classesCode} ) AS B ON B.CLASSESTREE_CODE = A.PARENT_CODE INNER JOIN pd_classestree C ON C.PARENT_CODE = A.CLASSESTREE_CODE INNER JOIN pd_classestree D ON D.PARENT_CODE = C.CLASSESTREE_CODE INNER JOIN pd_classestree E ON E.PARENT_CODE = D.CLASSESTREE_CODE INNER JOIN pd_classestree F ON F.PARENT_CODE = E.CLASSESTREE_CODE INNER JOIN pd_classestree_mat A1 ON C.CLASSESTREE_CODE = A1.CLASSESTREE_CODE LEFT JOIN sl_product PD ON PD.PD_CLASSES_CODE = B.LEVEL_CODE AND PD.MACHINING_CODE = A.LEVEL_CODE AND PD.PD_BREED_CODE = C.LEVEL_CODE AND PD.PD_FEATURE_CODE = D.LEVEL_CODE AND PD.WEIGHT_CODE = E.LEVEL_CODE LEFT JOIN SL_SELLER SL1 ON SL1.EP_ID=PD.PROD_EP_ID LEFT JOIN sl_pd_pkg PKG ON PKG.SL_PD_ID = PD.SL_PD_ID AND PKG.PKG_CODE=F.LEVEL_CODE LEFT JOIN sl_seller SL ON PD.SL_CODE=SL.SL_CODE LEFT JOIN sl_enterprise ET ON ET.EP_ID=SL.EP_ID LEFT JOIN sl_enterprise ET2 ON ET2.EP_ID=PD.PROD_EP_ID LEFT JOIN sl_ep_brand BD ON BD.EP_ID=PD.BRAND_EP_ID AND BD.BRAND_ID=PD.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN ds_sl_pd_lot LOT ON LOT.SL_CODE = PD.SL_CODE AND LOT.PD_CODE = CONCAT(B.LEVEL_CODE,A.LEVEL_CODE,C.LEVEL_CODE,D.LEVEL_CODE,E.LEVEL_CODE,2) AND LOT.SL_CODE_MANUFACTURE in ( SELECT SL_CODE_MANUFACTURE FROM sl_seller WHERE EP_ID=PD.PROD_EP_ID )
